Key Match Events: Buttler dropped a reverse-sweep off Patel's first ball.
Axar Patel took two for seven off his first balls.
Rohit and SKY combined for 104 runs off 75 balls.
Axar Patel took a wicket with the first ball of his over three times.
England was all out for 103 runs.
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma said, 'Very satisfying,... the conditions were challenging.'
England’s spinners took one for 49 off eight overs, while India’s had four for 25.
India outplayed England in all departments.
Rohit and SKY were immense (104 off 75 between them).
Pandya and Jadeja chipped in with sparky cameos (40 off 22).
Post-Match Reflections: Buttler said, 'Really proud of everyone,... played some really good cricket... in patches.'

Harry Lang said, 'Can this, at long, long last, be the end of anyone pretending Bairstow’s talent was 'on a break'? It’s MIA, has been for some time and I for one am keen to see which young English player can be given a chance to score some runs – any runs – in his stead.'
Rohit Sharma said, 'We worked very hard as a unit, adapted well... the conditions were challenging.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Guyana.
The weather affected the match, leading to rain delays.
This was revenge for the hammering India took in the semi-final of 2022.
Virat Kohli struggled in the match.
